main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of an object similar to a star in Outlook, Montana, on May 6th.
interesting points: The object moved from East to West, appeared like a falling star but stopped and moved back and forth., The observation was made around 0330Z at night., Duration of the sighting is omitted., The observer's reliability is unknown., There are several hypotheses regarding the object's identity, including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical.
sighted object: one yellowish object in the sky
